welcome_message_body: Welcome to La Uruca, Costa Rica! Get ready to experience the charm and beauty of our city, known for its vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and stunning natural landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that La Uruca has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tobias Bolaños International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Juan Santamaría International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Juan Santamaría International Airport serves flights to and from other Central American countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guapiles Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Guapiles Airport, handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rio Frio Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rio Frio Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
